com.palo.palo

Class SharedPrefManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.palo.palo.SharedPrefManager

  • public class SharedPrefManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store information for the user and check if the user should still be logged in or logged out.

      • getInstance

        public static SharedPrefManager getInstance(android.content.Context c)

      • login

        public void login(User user)
        This method is used when the User logs in. This will the application the user is logged in.
        Parameters:
        user: - The given user and their information.

      • logout

        public void logout()
        This method is used when the User logs out. This will tell the application the user is logged out.

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn()
        This method is used while the user is inside the app to tell the application the user is either currently logged in or not.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean if the user is logged in or not.

      • getUser

        public User getUser()
        This method is used to return the currently logged in user.
        Returns:
        Returns the user.
